# empty

**Type Property**

An empty bounding box.

## Declaration

```swift
static let empty: BoundingBox
```

## Discussion

An empty bounding box is defined with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BoundingBox/min] set to positive infinity and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BoundingBox/max] set to negative infinity.



## Getting an empty box

- **isEmpty**: A Boolean that indicates whether the bounding box is empty.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the bounding box is empty.
